pages.text: Sanctaris is the radiant school of light, purity, and divine magic. Its practitioners can call upon the forces of heaven to heal the wounded, banish evil, and protect the innocent.
Holy magic is the force of righteousness, the antithesis of dark magic, and it allows its users to create powerful shields of light, summon celestial beings, and purify corruption.
Practitioners of Sanctaris are often seen as protectors or paladins, bound by a sense of duty to safeguard life and fight against the forces of darkness.
